metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2776 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The parse_SST function in FreeXL before 1.0.0i allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (memory consumption) via a crafted shared stringstable in a workbook.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2776` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfreexl1 - 1.0.0g-1ubuntu0.14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freexl package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0g-1ubuntu0.14.04.1').
